overview: Olivier began working in the network security industry as a R&D engineer and team manager. By combining a perfect marketing understanding with his strong technical background, he took the position of VP Product Marketing. In 2006, he co-founded Pepita with Nicolas Stehle and Frederic Bocquet to build a distributed e-commerce platform that would help e-merchants to sell anywhere customers are. As co-founder and CMO of Pepita, Olivier is charge of products specifications and roadmap definition.
